Steps.StepString: Override the default User-Agent request with a PicoBrowser agent
Use the Referer header to show it's from the same site
Use the Date header with any value from 2018
Use the DNT header which means 'do not track' to 1 (true)
Use the X-Forwarded-For header to change the originating IP address with a random IP address from Sweden
Use the Accept-Language header to specify which languages are ok with Sweden's subtag `sv`
